## Slides.addSlide() method

Adds a slide to the slide show

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addSlide(slideUrl: string, jumpToSlide?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  slideUrl | string | The url of the slide to add. This is the url of the image that will be shown on the slide. It can be in the scene or in the internet. |
|  jumpToSlide | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If true, the slide will be shown immediately. If false, the slide will be added to the end of the slide show. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
